t: The CEO’s Role in Security Leadership | AWS Executive Insights
s: My guest today needs no introduction: Adam Selipsky, CEO of AWS. Listen in as we discuss how security culture was first established at AWS, what communication looks like between the CEO and CISO, and how Adam supports security initiatives from the top.

He held more than 2.160 million common shares of Amazon.com and was estimated to have a net worth of almost $500 million as of January 2025.

t: Ali Hamsa Yusuf, Amazon security guard almost killed colleague, Columbus officer
s: May 15, 2024 - Ali Hamsa Yusuf was not supposed to be armed as contracted security guard at Amazon. He shot at supervisor and missed, hit Columbus officer in vest
